thread.title: Lowe's Companies, Inc. Invites You to Join Its First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call Webcast

author: cnbc.com
title: Lowe's Companies, Inc. Invites You to Join Its First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call Webcast
text:
MOORESVILLE, N.C., May 16, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- In conjunction with the Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) first quarter 2018 earnings press release, you are invited to listen to its conference call to be broadcast live over the internet on Wednesday, May 23, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time with: Robert A. Niblock, chairman, president and chief executive officer; Michael P. McDermott, chief customer officer; and Marshall A. Croom, chief financial officer. Supplemental slides will be available fifteen minutes prior to the start of the conference call.
What:
First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call Webcast
When:
9:00 a.m. Eastern Time on Wednesday, May 23, 2018
Where:
Visit Lowe's Investor Relations website at http://www.Lowes.com/investor
Click on Webcasts and then on Lowe's First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
How:
Listen live online and view the supplemental slides by following the directions above
A webcast replay of the call can be accessed from 12:00 p.m. ET on May 23, 2018 through August 21, 2018 by visiting http://www.Lowes.com/investor and clicking on Webcasts and then on Lowe's First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call.
Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) is a FORTUNEÂ® 50 home improvement company serving more than 18 million customers a week in the United States, Canada and Mexico. With fiscal year 2017 sales of $68.6 billion, Lowe's and its related businesses operate or service more than 2,390 home improvement and hardware stores and employ over 310,000 people. Founded in 1946 and based in Mooresville, N.C., Lowe's supports the communities it serves through programs that focus on K-12 public education and community improvement projects. For more information, visit Lowes.com .
